entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
